dict.acceptation: 辩护；保卫；（足球、曲棍球等）防守；进行辩护；

sent.orig: A person has the right to defend himself/People have the right to defend themselves.
God defend me from my friends; from my enemies I can defend myself.
sent.trans: 防备朋友，要靠上帝；防备敌人，要需自己。
“为我自己申辩？”格兰瓜尔咕哝着，“我为自己辩护什么呢？”

sent.orig: May god defend me from my friends; I can defend myself from my enemies.
sent.trans: 愿上帝替我抵抗我的朋友；我能自己抵抗我的敌人。

sent.orig: The light established to defend inspect atelier, defend technically with what differ inspect talk about collaboration.
sent.trans: 光线成立了一个卫视工作室，专门和不同的卫视谈合作。
